title: 旧约 - 创世记(Genesis) - 第 15 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 创世记(Genesis) -- 第 15 章 ( 本篇共有 50 章 )

lineList.en: After these things the word of the LORD came unto Abram in a vision, saying, Fear not, Abram: I am thy shield, and thy exceeding great reward.
lineList.cn: 这事以后，耶和华在异象中有话对亚伯兰说，亚伯兰，你不要惧怕，我是你的盾牌，必大大地赏赐你。

lineList.en: And Abram said, LORD God, what wilt thou give me, seeing I go childless, and the steward of my house is this Eliezer of Damascus?
lineList.cn: 亚伯兰说，主耶和华阿，我既无子，你还赐我什么呢，并且要承受我家业的是大马士革人以利以谢。

lineList.en: And Abram said, Behold, to me thou hast given no seed: and, lo, one born in my house is mine heir.
lineList.cn: 亚伯兰又说，你没有给我儿子。那生在我家中的人就是我的后嗣。

lineList.en: And, behold, the word of the LORD came unto him, saying, This shall not be thine heir; but he that shall come forth out of thine own bowels shall be thine heir.
lineList.cn: 耶和华又有话对他说，这人必不成为你的后嗣。你本身所生的才成为你的后嗣。

lineList.en: And he brought him forth abroad, and said, Look now toward heaven, and tell the stars, if thou be able to number them: and he said unto him, So shall thy seed be.
lineList.cn: 于是领他走到外边，说，你向天观看，数算众星，能数得过来吗。又对他说，你的后裔将要如此。

lineList.en: And he believed in the LORD; and he counted it to him for righteousness.
lineList.cn: 亚伯兰信耶和华，耶和华就以此为他的义。

lineList.en: And he said unto him, I am the LORD that brought thee out of Ur of the Chaldees, to give thee this land to inherit it.
lineList.cn: 耶和华又对他说，我是耶和华，曾领你出了迦勒底的吾珥，为要将这地赐你为业。

lineList.en: And he said, LORD God, whereby shall I know that I shall inherit it?
lineList.cn: 亚伯兰说，主耶和华阿，我怎能知道必得这地为业呢。

lineList.en: And he said unto him, Take me an heifer of three years old, and a she goat of three years old, and a ram of three years old, and a turtledove, and a young pigeon.
lineList.cn: 他说，你为我取一只三年的母牛，一只三年的母山羊，一只三年的公绵羊，一只斑鸠，一只雏鸽。

lineList.en: And he took unto him all these, and divided them in the midst, and laid each piece one against another: but the birds divided he not.
lineList.cn: 亚伯兰就取了这些来，每样劈开，分成两半，一半对着一半地摆列，只有鸟没有劈开。

lineList.en: And when the fowls came down upon the carcases, Abram drove them away.
lineList.cn: 有鸷鸟下来，落在那死畜的肉上，亚伯兰就把它吓飞了。

lineList.en: And when the sun was going down, a deep sleep fell upon Abram; and, lo, an horror of great darkness fell upon him.
lineList.cn: 日头正落的时候，亚伯兰沉沉地睡了。忽然有惊人的大黑暗落在他身上。

lineList.en: And he said unto Abram, Know of a surety that thy seed shall be a stranger in a land that is not theirs, and shall serve them; and they shall afflict them four hundred years;
lineList.cn: 耶和华对亚伯兰说，你要的确知道，你的后裔必寄居别人的地，又服事那地的人。那地的人要苦待他们四百年。

lineList.en: And also that nation, whom they shall serve, will I judge: and afterward shall they come out with great substance.
lineList.cn: 并且他们所要服事的那国，我要惩罚，后来他们必带着许多财物从那里出来。

lineList.en: And thou shalt go to thy fathers in peace; thou shalt be buried in a good old age.
lineList.cn: 但你要享大寿数，平平安安地归到你列祖那里，被人埋葬。

lineList.en: But in the fourth generation they shall come hither again: for the iniquity of the Amorites is not yet full.
lineList.cn: 到了第四代，他们必回到此地，因为亚摩利人的罪孽还没有满盈。

lineList.en: And it came to pass, that, when the sun went down, and it was dark, behold a smoking furnace, and a burning lamp that passed between those pieces.
lineList.cn: 日落天黑，不料有冒烟的炉并烧着的火把从那些肉块中经过。

lineList.en: In the same day the LORD made a covenant with Abram, saying, Unto thy seed have I given this land, from the river of Egypt unto the great river, the river Euphrates:
lineList.cn: 当那日，耶和华与亚伯兰立约，说，我已赐给你的后裔，从埃及河直到伯大河之地，

lineList.en: The Kenites, and the Kenizzites, and the Kadmonites,
lineList.cn: 就是基尼人，基尼洗人，甲摩尼人，

lineList.en: And the Hittites, and the Perizzites, and the Rephaims,
lineList.cn: 赫人，比利洗人，利乏音人，

lineList.en: And the Amorites, and the Canaanites, and the Girgashites, and the Jebusites.
lineList.cn: 亚摩利人，迦南人，革迦撒人，耶布斯人之地。
